original_text: He would not allow me to breathe quietly. Instead, he would make me very upset. He would not allow me to breathe quietly.
korean_text: 나를 숨 쉬지 못하게 하시며 괴로움을 내게 채우시는구나

sentences.original_text: He would not allow me to breathe quietly
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 조용히 숨 쉬도록 허락하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: he would make me very upset
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나를 매우 속상하게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He would not allow me to breathe quietly
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 조용히 숨 쉬도록 허락하지 않을 것이다
